pullrequest.title: Add 3D Lidar mesh and put it on WAM-V

content.raw:
I think that Cole, our 3D artist, put the texture somehow in the file that we’re using as a GPS texture:

[https://www.dropbox.com/sh/eowhsjv4b2cfmfm/AAAmINYiTH65amR7pazK-zs9a?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/eowhsjv4b2cfmfm/AAAmINYiTH65amR7pazK-zs9a?dl=0)

I haven't tested it, let me know if we need to keep it in a separate `.png`.
